But you can feel your arms when you try to move them, and can feel your fingernails digging into the skin of your palm as you tightly squeeze your fists. That settles it then. You have somehow become invisible!

You honestly don't know how to feel about this. It's such a bizarre thing to have happen, your mind is racing with jumbled up thoughts, fears, as well as potential benefits. Is the power of invisibility a good thing to take advantage of? Or is it a living nightmare?

Where have you woken up?

1) At home, where you live with your girlfriend and her sister. Will you try (hopelessly) to avoid them sitting on you without their knowledge? Or do you want to know what it would feel like underneath them? Perhaps instead you'll venture outside and try to find someone to help you?

2) In the home of a average-sized redheaded gamer. As you see her enter the room, you realize that you're slumped against her gaming chair, the back of your head on the seat. Unbeknownst to you, she plans to stay seated for hours of gaming. Will you stay put, sit normally on the chair for a safer experience, or try to escape?

3) In a plush office. A tall, chubby blonde businesswoman walks in. As she approaches the desk, you realize that you're seated on her plush leather chair. Will you remain where you are, slump down to see what it would be like as a human butt cushion? Or get out of the way before she can squash you?

4) Laid on a queen-size bed. A brunette BBW plus-size model walks in, wearing sexy lingerie. Is she accompanied by photographers, ready for her to lay down for a shoot, requiring her to be in several positions on the area you currently occupy? Or is she coming to lay down and rest after a shoot, with you currently laid in her usual spot? Will you stay or go?

5) More options, including a celebrity section.

1421.title: Trapped in a Twin Planet Crater

choices: She's sitting forward on it, and buries your face in her chest
She's sitting backward on it, squishing your face into her back
She's sitting on it sideways, grinding uncomfortably on your lap
144.content:
You quickly scrambled out of the way in a panic, diving off the bed just as her enormous weight slams down onto the bed in the spot you had laid in just seconds before. If you had been there, her oceans of flesh would have pulverised you. That massive ass looked like a lethal weapon, and you didn't want to risk having it squash you.

You dashed through the now closing bedroom door in a hurry, leaving the woman. Without a plan in mind, you decided to take a tour of her house. It was a nice home, with spacious rooms, plenty of decorated furniture and mementos.

Eventually you decided the living room would be an ideal place to rest while you worked out what to do. While you weren't thrilled about hanging out in the house of a woman who could squish you to death with her hefty weight, where else would you go? The large couch didn't seem like a good place to rest. By nature, it was very likely that sooner or later the BBW would want to rest her humongous ass on that couch. You didn't want to be there when it happened.

But then your eye spotted a lone wooden chair in a corner of the room. That looked ideal. It didn't seem to you that a regular chair would be a common seat for such a large woman. You could probably sit there and she wouldn't bother you if she came to the living room.

Sitting down, you felt the weight of your situation finally hit you. You felt tired, and you supposed resting your eyes for a short while couldn't hurt. Within no time at all, you drifted off to sleep.

You were suddenly jolted back from slumber as you felt a punishingly heavy weight lower into your lap. You blinked your eyes open to an astonishing sight. The BBW from earlier was sitting on you, but this time she was naked! All of her near 400 pounds was bearing down in your lap, causing you to groan and cry out in pain from the weight, but she didn't seem to notice.

Unbeknownst to you, the chair you'd sat down in was her prop chair for photo shoots. And right now she was in the middle of one, her photographer in place while she sat down onto the chair, completely unaware that the chair was already occupied with another human being. The chair could just about manage to bear her weight under normal circumstances. But would it hold up under both her gigantic body and your much smaller one?

What position is she sitting in?
144.title: Escape to Chair Cushion

choices: An SSBBW Gainer's Home
An All-Female Party
On a Bus
More Choices
Celebrities

154.content:
What about these choices?


1)The Water Park, where people both sunbathe and relax, and being able to sneak into a dressing room or sauna was an added plus.

2)The Amusement Park, where you could either go for a thrill by sitting under someone at a roller coaster, or just sitting under someone at one of the more tamer rides or food places.

3)The Movie Theaters, where you have a guaranteed timer as to not risk being stuck under someone for more then 2 hours.

4)The Local Female-Only Gym, where you can have a bunch of sweaty ladies either work out on you, do pushups over you, or just do yoga right above you.

5)Other Places?

1553.title: More Celebrity Categories

info.brief_description: You wake up invisible. Will you try to be sat on by or dodge the unaware women? Please add
info.description:
You wake up invisible. Will you take advantage of your newfound ability and try to end up underneath unaware, beautiful women? Or will you spend your time trying to avoid being squashed by curvy women who don't know you're there?

- The main character can change preferences through the story E.g. they might start the story wanting to be sat on, only to have it happen and hate it. Likewise they could start off trying to avoid being sat on, only to have it happen accidentally and enjoy it.
- Minimum of 1,000 characters per chapter.
- The main character can die, but only after six chapters.
- The main character can talk to the women and make them aware of their presence.
- The women cannot feel your presence while sitting on you, unless they know you're there (suggested by user MV4444)
- Any kind of body squashing is fine, it doesn't have to be focused solely on asses.
- If something you want to include is not mentioned in allowed/not allowed, go for it! If it's something I've overlooked which I'd rather not have, I'll message you before taking action.
- Try to avoid specifying the main character's gender unless absolutely necessary
- Have fun!

Allowed:
Ass squash
Boob crush
Full body laying
Facesitting
Chestsitting
Farting

Not Allowed:
Men (main character aside)
Characters under 18
Characters over 50
Rape
Scat
Peeing
Blood
Gratuitous violence

Disclaimer: This story is a work of purely erotic fiction and does not reflect the views of the authors.
